originalText.text: I visited this dealer 4/20/23 to port a line from another carrier.   I wanted to get a new phone with the activation.  The tag on the Samsung A23  that I requested said free with a new line activation.  The dealer salesperson named Ali, who said he was the manager and had 6 stores, said in order for me to get the phone for free I had to get the $60 plan and insurance.  I wanted the $40 plan with no insurance.  He would not budge on this and said the system would not allow discount the price unless I went with the $60 plan and insurance.  Those were all lies.  He said I could change the plan after a month and remove the insurance.  I completed the transaction and called metro pcs after I got home.  They removed the insurance, changed the plan for me,  and credited the difference of the overpayment. The dealer also assigned an account PIN and security question and password to my account of his own choosing, without consulting me. That was another issue I had to resolve with customer service. I will never do business with these dishonest characters again.

originalText.text: The phone that i got was broken LG phone. the guy who assisted me told me that i can get a new phone with new number. it was better for me. and Umberto helped me to move my data to another phone. i was happy to get my things done. wonderful customer service. i recommend.

originalText.text: I just have to say that I have always had excellent service at this metro store your employee Ali  was so helpful with getting my phone upgraded, finding me the best deal, helping me transfer all my data He went way above and beyond and managed to help other customers without neglecting me one bit!! Ali should be applauded for his great customer service and this store will forever get my business.

originalText.text: I guess, it was my lucky Sunday today. My phone was working slow. I went to this Metro Store. And Umberto helped me to fix all the problems that I have. He also advised me about Memory Card. He helped me a lot. Great customer service. Will definitely recommend.
